articles.content: Since launch, Call of Duty: Modern Warfare has been steadily growing in size thanks to its frequent, large updates. Following this week's latest patch and additional DLC content, the Modern Warfare file size now occupies close to 200GB on any given platform, … [+3298 chars]

articles.title: EVO 2020 is Online-Only This Summer - PCMag AU
articles.description: With large groups of people at risk of catching and spreading COVID-19, the Evolution Championship Series (EVO) will not hold its annual event in Las Vegas. It will, however, stream online.

articles.title: ​‘Golden Bridge’ shot wins top architecture photo prize for Vietnam - VnExpress International
articles.description: A shot of Vietnam’s famous Golden Bridge held up by two giant hands in Da Nang is Agora’s world’s best architecture photo of 2020.
articles.content:
The aerial shot won the most votes from users of Agora, the worlds biggest free-to-use photo app Agora, giving Vietnamese photographer Tran Tuan Viet the $1,000 top prize.
